meanings.sent1: The tired traveler felt cumbered by his heavy backpack.
meanings.sent2: The cumbered student struggled to carry all his books home.
meanings.sent3: The cumbered ant tried to lift a leaf bigger than itself.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt cumbered with sorrow after the loss of her pet.
meanings.sent5: The cumbered branches of the tree sagged under the weight of snow.

meanings.definition: Cluttered or filled with unnecessary items
meanings.sent1: The cumbered desk was covered in papers and pens.
meanings.sent2: Her room looked cumbered with toys scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The cumbered closet overflowed with old clothes and shoes.
meanings.sent4: The cumbered kitchen counter was cluttered with appliances.
meanings.sent5: The cumbered garage was filled with boxes and tools.

meanings.sent1: The fallen tree cumbered the path, blocking their way.
meanings.sent2: The heavy rain cumbered their journey to the top of the hill.
meanings.sent3: The slow traffic cumbered their drive to the airport.
meanings.sent4: His fear cumbered his ability to speak in front of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The thick fog cumbered their visibility on the road.
